translations: 误用；引错路；误导（陪审团）；瞄错方向（misdirect 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Many of the aid projects in the developing world have been misdirected in the past.
sentences.translation: 过去，许多对发展中国家的援助计划被误用了。

sentences.sentence: High rates of straying can be problematic because misdirected fish may interbreed with the existing stock to such a degree that any local adaptations that are present become diluted.
sentences.translation: 高偏离率可能是一个问题，因为被误导的鱼可能会与现有种群杂交，而这种杂交的程度会稀释现有的任何当地适应能力。

sentences.sentence: He had deliberately misdirected the reporters.
sentences.translation: 他故意给记者们指错了方向。
